info.name: SurveyData
info.description: Manages data collected for a survey

exec: pm.test("Status code name has string", function () {

body.raw:
{
  "SurveyId": "{{SurveyId}}",
  "InterviewId": {{InterviewId}},
  "DownloadTestInterviewData": true,
  "DownloadSuccessfulLiveInterviewData": true,
  "DownloadRejectedLiveInterviewData": true,
  "DownloadNotSuccessfulLiveInterviewData": true,
  "DownloadSuspendedLiveInterviewData": true,
  "DownloadParaData": true,
  "DownloadCapturedMedia": true,
  "DownloadClosedAnswerData": true,
  "DownloadOpenAnswerData": true,
  "DownloadFileName": "DownloadedFileName",
  "StartDate": "2015-11-05T15:16:41Z",
  "EndDate": "2015-11-05T15:16:41Z"
}

request.description: Post a request for a data download. The surveyDownloadDataRequest contains all the information needed to be able to create a download with just the information that is needed for this request.
